course_description: Introduction to theory of economic growth. The nature of economic development; factors influencing capital formation and technological advance; role of government in promoting development; relationship of international trade to growth; international economic policies.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON _OX 100 or ECON 101 or ECON_OX 101 or FIN 201 AND ECON 112  or ECON_OX112 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6494, Section #: 9000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
